title: Trump cuts hit struggling food banks, risking hunger for low-income Americans
shortDescription: Food banks across the country say they will have less food to distribute because of at least $1 billion in federal funding cuts and pauses.

title: Trump says Greenland invited US delegation. Not true, says Greenland.
shortDescription: Greenland flatly denied a claim made by President Donald Trump that officials from the island invited a delegation led by Usha Vance, the wife of Vice President JD Vance, to visit the Arctic territory this week.

title: Nazis were treated better than Venezuelans deported by Trump, judge says
shortDescription: A U.S. appeals court judge said Nazis were given more rights to contest their removal from the U.S. than Venezuelans deported by the Trump administration.

title: Columbia student sues Trump administration to prevent deportation
shortDescription: The Trump administration said Yunseo Chung's presence in the U.S. hinders its foreign policy agenda, according to the lawsuit.

title: Failed GOP candidate convicted in shooting spree aimed at Dems
shortDescription: Solomon PenÌƒa, 40, was found guilty in New Mexico of orchestrating attacks on Democratic lawmakers, including two who certified his election loss.

title: Top national security Democrats demand answers on Hegseth's leak of war plans
shortDescription: House Democrats demanded answers to the leak of war plans by Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth in a group chat.

title: 'Nazis got better treatment': Appeal judges question Trump deportations
shortDescription: An appeals court sent mixed signals on how it might rule on President Trump's effort to keep hasty deportations going under the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Democrats slam Trump officials for sharing military secrets
shortDescription: Top Trump administration national security officials added a journalist to a group chat where secret plans military attack plans were shared.

title: Donald Trump nominates new CDC director to work with RFK Jr.
shortDescription: Susan Monarez has been acting chief at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention since January. Her nomination came after David Weldon withdrew.

title: Trump: Hyundai investing $5.8B in first U.S. steel mill in Louisiana
shortDescription: Trump touted Hyundai's $5.8 billion in its first U.S. steel mill in Louisiana was a result of threatened tariffs on overseas manufacturing.

title: White House Easter Egg Roll goes corporate under Trump
shortDescription: The White House under President Trump has opened up this year's Easter Egg Roll to corporate sponsors that pay as much as $200,000.

title: Second judge blocks Trump's Pentagon policy banning transgender troops
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily blocked the Pentagon's ban on transgender service to prevent the removal of two Air Force sergeants while case is argued

title: Trump chooses his former lawyer Alina Habba as top NJ attorney
shortDescription: President Donald Trump chose Alina Habba, a loyal defender in court and on TV, to serve as interim New Jersey U.S. attorney.

title: Teachers' union sues Trump admin over Education Dept. dismantling
shortDescription: Trump's executive order trying to dismantle the Education Department is "unlawful," according to a lawsuit from the second largest teacher's union.

title: Supreme Court hears racial challenge to Louisiana's congressional map
shortDescription: The case tests the balancing act states must strike in protecting the voting power of a racial minority while not discriminating against other voters.

title: Trump envoy blasted for 'insane' praise of Vladimir Putin
shortDescription: In an interview with Tucker Carlson on Friday, Steve Witkoff, President Donald Trump's lead negotiator, heaped praise on Vladimir Putin.

title: Trump rages on Truth Social about portrait of him hanging in Colorado
shortDescription: Donald Trump claims a "distorted" portrait of him hung in Colorado was the governor's doing. But it was commissioned by state Republicans.

title: Trump vows 25% tariff on countries that buy oil, gas from Venezuela
shortDescription: President Trump on Monday said the U.S. will impose a 25% tariff on imports from countries that purchase oil or gasoline from Venezuela.
